name: Forest Totem
loreDescription: A totem deep within the forest. Make a wish before it, and if you hear the clear ringing of a bell, your wish will come true.

skillDescription.base: Has a 10.0% chance to grant continuous healing for 2 turns when attacked. Can be activated once every 2 turns.
skillDescription.max: Has a 20.0% chance to grant continuous healing for 2 turns when attacked. Can be activated once every 2 turns.
